articles.title: Bounce handling for Microsoft mailboxes
articles.desc: The compatibility with Microsoft mailboxes has been added for the bounce handling feature.

articles.title: Better anchors
articles.desc: The anchors in sent emails don't open in a new tab anymore when clicked on the online version.

articles.title: CC and BCC for our sending service
articles.desc: It is now possible to send emails to CC and BCC addresses using the AcyMailing sending service.

articles.title: Event dates now include the hour
articles.desc: [add-ons] The dates for inserted EventBooking events now include the time.

articles.title: Community Builder integration
articles.desc: [add-ons] The Community Builder integration's options are now correctly shown.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Detailed statistics export
articles.desc: Fixed the error when exporting the links details in the detailed statistics.

articles.title: Profile form display
articles.desc: Fixed the error when displaying forms in the user edit profile page in the front-end.

articles.title: Detailed stats: link layout
articles.desc: Fixed the wrong display of long links in the detailed statistics page.

articles.title: Subscriber sorting by date
articles.desc: Fixed the bug affecting the sorting of subscribers by subscription date when editing a list.

articles.title: Bounce rules
articles.desc: Fixed the error that could occur when running the bounce rules.

articles.title: List doesn't appear unsubscribe page
articles.desc: We have fixed an error that could occur in rare cases that was causing lists not to appear on the unsubscribe page.

articles.title: List edition
articles.desc: 'We have fixed the problem that when you save a list in the edition page while being on the Subscribers or Unsubscribers tab, the list's description, tags and accesses were deleted.
